scripts.install-all-packages: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ..
scripts.api-start-windows: npm run get-db-url && npm run build && cd api && npm start
scripts.get-db-url: del /f .env && echo REACT_APP_DATABASE_URL= > .env && heroku config:get DATABASE_URL -a edumate >> .env
scripts.build: rmdir /s /q build && cd api && rmdir /s /q public && mkdir public && cd ../ && react-scripts build && cd build && cd .. && xcopy build api\public /s /E
